item.description:
I've posted all 5 Oscar nominees before but for those of you who couldnt make it and want to catch up before the Academy Awards, AMC is showing all 5 films for one low price. This event has no organizer (unless someone wants to volunteer) so look for each other in the lobby.

Details:

On Saturday, Feb. 21, check out the "AMC Best Picture Showcase," featuring all five Best Picture Oscar® nominees (Milk, The Reader, The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, Slumdog Millionaire and Frost/Nixon) playing back-to-back throughout the day at select AMC theatres nationwide. The $30 admission also includes a large popcorn with unlimited refills, plus a collectible pass featuring the five nominated films.

Oscar® is the registered trademark and service mark of the Academy of Motion Pictures Arts and Sciences.

Event Schedule Showtimes:

Milk (R) - 10:30 a.m.
The Reader (R) - 1:05 p.m.
The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (PG-13) - 3:45 p.m.
Slumdog Millionaire (R) - 7:15 p.m.
Frost/Nixon (R) - 9:45 p.m.


Thanks to Chris for letting me know about this!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for each other in the lobby. The movies start at 10:30am.
item.name: AMC Best Picture Showcase - all 5 Oscar Best Picture Nominees
